name: Random
description: Example plugin that shows how to write a meter plugin in C by generating random data from a configured range

paramSchema.title: Minimum
paramSchema.name: min
paramSchema.description: Lower limit on the random number generated.

paramSchema.title: Maximum
paramSchema.name: max
paramSchema.description: Upper limit on the random number generated.

paramSchema.title: Interval
paramSchema.name: interval
paramSchema.description: How often to send measurement in seconds
